ygData.subject: Re: New Tinkered Items
ygData.msgSnippet: You go guy!!! Zott the Wizard Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
You go guy!!!

Zott the Wizard

Xegony


On Mon, 1 Nov 1999 07:43:14 EST, you wrote:

>From: JKapp27@...
>
>Well it seems all the peices to the puzzle are there now.
>Its obvious they start everything on test then transfer it to live servers as
>its working.I keep a guy on test, nongnome, forgive me, just to play and see
>the new items etc..As far as the first guy who found the book and refuses to
>share til dec 1st, I say your greedy and may the gods strike you down! lest i
>get a hold of u 1st! I wil go to akanon tonight on test to verify all the
>above info. Further, if the books are there expect to see a post from myself
>with ALL the recipes in full, as this is the nature of gnomes being the most
>prolific race in the game,to share with our brothers and sisters.
>Dwizz Singez
>lvl 35 magician
>tribunal
